description: Structures the AI's response in a tabular format with defined columns. This decorator is ideal for presenting comparative data, lists of items with attributes, or any information that benefits from clear columnar organization.

parameters.name: columns
parameters.description: List of column names for the table

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format style for the table representation

examples.description: Simple comparison table in markdown format
examples.usage:
+++TableFormat(columns=[Feature, TypeScript, JavaScript])
Compare TypeScript and JavaScript features.
examples.result: Presents a markdown table comparing features of TypeScript and JavaScript with three columns

examples.description: Detailed CSV table with specific columns
examples.usage:
+++TableFormat(columns=[Planet, Diameter, Distance from Sun, Orbital Period, Number of Moons], format=csv)
List the planets in our solar system with their key characteristics.
examples.result: Generates a CSV-formatted table containing detailed information about each planet with the specified columns
